name: Construction Truck Simulator
description: Drive over 15 vehicles, operate large cranes and machines, complete easy and complex objectives and explore an open world environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct 3D compatible graphics card with 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
